name: The Depths of a Grudge
description:
You stumble upon and wander into an otherwordly bar when it's closed, pissing off its powerful inhabitant.

Use your lack of social grace to try survive an encounter with an extremely grumpy, extremely pissed, kinda hot eldritch goddess.

My first attempt at a visual novel. After I made a a silly post about a version of my vtuber character, Mauve, judging you for making weird choices in a visual novel, my community really loved the idea of it. I ended up asking if people would want a entire visual novel where I just judged them and was really angry at them all the time, and they said yeah. 

It kinda all went from there, my own weird ambition and perfectionism making me add more and more.

Thanks for checking it out <3

(Screenshots are pre-release and small changes may be made before release.)

(Release TBA 2022)
